attributes.action: Review the current sentencing guide used by Judges
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For all crimes, there should be fixed minimum sentance given. E.g. A convicted murderer should be given a minimum of 25 years BEFORE parole can be considered.
This would replace the current system where two people commiting the same crime receive two very different sentences.
New laws need to be bought in to cope with online paedophiles.
Judges should not be able suspend sentences, if they commit a crime which is punishable with jail, they should serve their sentence in Jail.
Repeat offenders should have their sentence double with each offence.
Prisoners should be made to carry out hard labour.
Prisoners rights to phonecards etc should be stopped.
Prisoners familes should assist in the cost that person being in jail by contributing towards food, water and heating biils.
